Traits.Name: Silent Watch
Traits.Content: The Moddey Dhoo is always aware of its surroundings and can sense creatures within 30 feet, even if they are invisible or hidden.

Traits.Name: Cursed Gaze
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the Moddey Dhoo and can see its eyes must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. A cursed creature takes 3d6 necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The curse lasts until removed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Hound of Dead, Moddey Dhoo makes two primary attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target suffers the Frightened condition (escape DC 14), and the Hound uses its Cursed Gaze ability on it.

Actions.Name: Primary Attack
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) necrotic damage. The jaws of the Moddey Dhoo tear into the flesh of its prey, leaving a lingering curse upon those who succumb to its bite.

Actions.Name: Cursed Gaze
Actions.Content: The Moddey Dhoo locks eyes with a creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. A cursed creature takes 13 (2d8 + 4) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The curse lasts until removed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

Actions.Name: Shadow of Death
Actions.Content: The Moddey Dhoo shrouds a target in a wave of invisible terror. One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become paralyzed until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, it also takes 13 (2d8 + 4) necrotic damage as it feels the weight of impending doom. This ability recharges after a short or long rest.
